column4: hey,  I'm trying to install Ubuntu on my friends drive... and the install freezes at around 30% ....
it's kind of embarassing, I told him how great it is
do the cd integrity check,   and when exactaly does it stop at 30 % during install or the hdd formating ?
it freezes well after formatting and partitioning
run the disk integrity check,  from the boot menu
zero checksums failed
either  the cd is borked or the  cd drive has a problem
he's also got a parallel to serial ATA adaptor on the drive.... could that be a problem?
I woudlnT know
it's being recognized as scuzzy on ubuntu
we all have our special glasses on , we can all read smallcap
I know... just... I've been trying to get this for a while now... on and off for a week
lol too late... he just did a hit and run
was it taken over by the ppl of the from ubuntu-de ?
that's actully kind of funny
crashes are not normal no
check the speaker plug and power
did that
ask in #compiz-fusion
ah, good idea
;-( it's one of those quiet channels.  nobody on here knows where the setting for it may be?
not me, I don't do candy
